snippet: The police charged a young couple with criminal possession of a loaded firearm and criminal possession of an explosive substance after a search of their Greenwich Village apartment.
abstract: New York City police investigators find what appear to be ingredients for terrorist bomb in Greenwich Village apartment of Morgan Gliedman and Aaron Greene; no evidence of a planned attack is found; Greene and Gliedman are charged with criminal possession of explosive substance as well as loaded firearm.
lead_paragraph: The police charged a young couple with criminal possession of a loaded firearm and criminal possession of an explosive substance after a search of their Greenwich Village apartment.

headline.seo: Manhattan Couple Stored Bomb-Making Items, Police Say
headline.main: Manhattan Couple Stored Bomb-Making Items, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Manhattan Couple Stored Bomb-Making Items, Police Say
